defaultRejectMessage:
Dear {{APPLICANT_FIRST_NAME}},


I am pleased to inform you that we would like to offer you a position in our research group. We were impressed by your background, motivation, and potential for contributing to our academic and applied research efforts.


As a candidate, you will take responsibility for managing your research project, including defining your research direction, publishing your results, and contributing to ongoing team activities. This position requires a high level of commitment, independence, and communication.


We are confident in your ability to succeed in this role and look forward to seeing your impact on the group and the broader academic community. To discuss the next steps, please contact me at {{ PROFESSOR_EMAIL }}.


You can revisit and view the details about your position at:
{{JOB_URL}}


Best regards,

{{PROFESSOR_FIRST_NAME}}

{{PROFESSOR_FIRST_NAME}} {{PROFESSOR_LAST_NAME}}
{{RESEARCH_GROUP_NAME}}
Technical University of Munich
{{PROFESSOR_EMAIL}}
